links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,100
prog: (PARI) for(n=0,21,print(round(exp(n*Pi))))(PARI) { default(realprecision, 200); for (n=0, 100, write("b062511.txt", n, " ", round(exp(n*Pi))) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 24 2001
